pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyRoll Lendl Equivalent MethodPlugin for PyRoll providing the equivalent method from A.E. Lendl.For the docs, see [here](docs/docs.pdf).This project is licensed under the [BSD-3-Clause license](LICENSE).The package is available via [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/pyroll-lendl-euquivalent-method/) and can be installed with pip install pyroll-lendl-equivalent-method
